prompts.title: SEO Product Description Generator
prompts.content:
Act like an SEO expert. Write a product description for {{product}} that incorporates SEO best practices. Ensure the content includes:
1. Clear and concise product features
2. Keywords integrated naturally
3. Benefits and value propositions for the user
4. Call to action

Target audience: {{audience}}
Tone: {{tone}}
prompts.description: Generate SEO-friendly product descriptions that drive traffic and conversions

prompts.title: SEO Newsletter Introduction
prompts.content:
Act like an SEO content writer. Write an introduction for a monthly newsletter about {{newsletterTopic}}. The introduction should:
1. Hook the reader with an engaging opening
2. Introduce the topic of the newsletter
3. Include SEO-friendly keywords naturally
4. Encourage readers to continue reading

Target audience: {{audience}}
Tone: {{tone}}
prompts.description: Create an SEO-optimized introduction for a monthly newsletter that engages readers
